alert.note: Alert for Washtenaw (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 24 at 10:26PM EDT until August 24 at 10:45PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN WASHTENAW COUNTY... At 1025 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Canton to near Milan to near Tecumseh, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe thunderstorms will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Washtenaw County, including the following locations... Hudson Mills, Delhi Mills, Lyndon Township, Hudson Mills Metropark and Barton Hills. People attending Chelsea Community Fair should seek safe shelter immediately! HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
